activities:
Personal information that is gathered through the means listed on the GlobalEnglish Privacy Policy may be used to fill orders, provide customer service assistance, and improve the content and learning experience.  Certain of the personal information may also be shared with third parties if we think that they may benefit the users, including other businesses and companies that sell a variety of products and services, provided the customer may elect not to share such information at the time the information is requested or at a subsequent time.    
GlobalEnglish will use personal information gathered from employees and job applicants for employment related purposes.
contacttitle1: Senior Counsel; Senior Director of Business Affairs
corpofftitle1: Senior Counsel; Senior Director of Business Affairs

recoursemech: Commitment to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the EU (DPAs) and Switzerland (Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)).
